Details.Synopsis: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption. He confronts his fears and learns what it means to be a hero.
Awards: Saturn Award for Best Action/Adventure Film

Details.Synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, forcing Batman to accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
Awards: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor (Heath Ledger)

movies.Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

Details.Synopsis: Fearing the actions of Superman, Gotham City’s own formidable vigilante, Batman, takes on Metropolis’s most revered, modern-day savior while the world wrestles with what sort of hero it really needs. Their conflict ignites a battle for the ages.
Awards: Teen Choice Award for Choice Movie Actor: Action

Details.Synopsis: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing the serial killer known as the Riddler. The film explores Batman's detective skills and his psychological struggles.
Awards: Critics' Choice Super Awards for Best Superhero Movie
